actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Labor to establish a pilot grant program to retrain displaced workers in high technology fields.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Labor, pursuant to specified provisions of the Workforce Investment Act of 1998, to establish a pilot program to award grants for retraining displaced workers in high technology fields. Makes eligible to receive such grants schools or vocational or career training centers in the State of Pennsylvania that conduct training in high technology fields. Sets the amount of such a grant at $10,000 for each displaced worker enrolled.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Labor to establish a pilot grant program to retrain displaced workers in high technology fields.
